phrases: To awaken us, the young mankind,
and fight to protect their loved ones
Will set out on their journey as the war rages on.
Slicing through the darkness they fly toward
That blue planet that shines in the distance
We are reading a metallic signature at 1 of the clock, range 10 km!
I wonder if it is the enemy base?
Enemy missiles, twenty seconds to impact!
Skull Leader, we are reading a metallic signature at the missile launch site.
I am not getting any life signs.
Looks like those missiles were an automated attack system.
The guys who were here must have really panicked.
They could not have left more than two or three hours ago.
Commander, there is a large stash of weapons in the arms depot.
Go ahead and block off the depot, just to be safe.
Looks like our job just got easier.
But will not they just do something reckless to get more weapons?
This feeling of speed is the best!
Hey, are you bums keeping up?!
You are in a good mood, Boss.
You say I am falling for him
A salt breeze blows, a big wave
He begins to occupy my heart...
Minmay, we have got to get out of here!
What do you think you are doing?!
What are you doing with Minmay?!
It is got nothing to do with you losers.
Come on, let us get the hell out of this town.
It is been a long time, old man Global.
What is the meaning of this?!
You know who these two are, yes?
If you value their lives, you will give me a warship by 0600 hours tomorrow.
Then by six AM tomorrow, these two will be goners!
You cannot give these people a...
If that ship is worth handing over to them, then...
Well, you can do what he says or what I say, it is up to you.
Oh, and make sure it comes fully equipped, okay?
Taking these two prisoner and trading'them for a warship!
No, I just learned how to do things the Earth way.
Well, it is up to the military now.
This is all part of the plan, but I really cannot stand waiting.
I want to see war and chaos!
Maybe in the meantime, you can be my toy.
Standing before me, a sad look on your face
I know you are going off to war
Is that what you thought I would do?
We are not so unsophisticated that you can fool us like that anymore!
You surprised us with your songs
but that was back before we knew the first thing about culture!
Did you really think your songs have the power to move people?
We would just never heard one before, that is all.
But those idiots got themselves all riled up about culture.
You turned them into a bunch of cowards!
She is not dead, is she?
I forgot she was our valuable hostage.
Fine, but just a little more...
Such a cultured game, would not you say?
The Zentradi have never taken hostages and demanded anything like this before.
We humans have influenced them once again, eh?
Giving those people a battleship is completely unacceptable!
We should launch an all-out strike to prevent this from happening again!
The problem is that the hostages are celebrities.
If we ignore this demand and they end up getting killed, the media...
Our governmental authority still is not firmly established.
We must avoid agitating the public!
There is still plenty of time left before 0600 tomorrow.
I am sure we can come up with an idea or two before then.
The 103rd Destroid Platoon has its garrison there,
so it looks like this will be a joint operation, and you will be in command.
I will go over the mission details one more time and then start issuing orders.
I will be waiting for you with some rose tea.
Get me our escort, Captain Ichijo.
This is Cheshire Cat. Skull Leader, please respond.
Our worst predictions have come true.
He is taken hostages in lonesco City and is demanding a battleship for their return.
He does not fool around, does he?
And here we have spent all this time looking for him...
There are two of them: Kaifun and...
Yes, as of right now, she is fine.
Anyway, we are going to coordinate with a nearby Destroid platoon and...
This is going to be a joint operation with another unit.
I will inform you of the details later.
Uh, yeah, for the most part.
What is she so mad about?
Anyway, I cannot believe he took Minmay hostage!
Say, do you really think Kamujin will fall for this?
We have already been over this a dozen times.
This is Kamujin we are talking about.
But what if he does not?
So you would rather surround the city and start attacking
while I slip in and rescue the hostages?!
That idea the top brass came up with has no regard for the hostages' lives
so if that is the plan that gets used, you can count me out!
Look, there is a way that things are done in the field, all right?
I have been put in charge of this operation!
The lives of the hostages take top priority!
You sure get worked up over Minmay, do not you?
Would you be like this if I were the hostage?
How can you joke around like that when peoples' lives are at stake?!
Destroid platoon, stand by to scramble.
I cannot believe how hard they shoved those things in.
Do you think someone will help us?
I cannot imagine the military just handing over a battleship for us.
If this is not handled right, we might be left to fend for ourselves.
If that is what it comes to, we do not have much choice.
I wonder if Hikaru will come save us?
Okay, let us try talking to them.
They are humans, just like us!
No matter what happens, you are nothing but talk, are not you?
What good will a battleship do you?
Will you start another war and because the deaths of your brothers?
You all know the pointlessness of war.
But now you have come into contact with culture, yes?
Go back to living your lives according to culture!
Simply obeying your destructive impulses is no kind of life!
You are one annoying fool, you know that?
We know how to make culture.
This is how you make culture!
Boss, I am sorry to interrupt while you are making culture...
But some of our guys are calling in and asking for help.
Just when the culture was getting good.
We will pick up from there later!
We heard you were in lonesco City, and...
Anyway, we came here hoping you would let us join you,
but we were spotted by a patrol unit!
All right, men, we are heading out!
It is time to get rid of all that anger we have been keepin' in!
You are taking all these men?
That is almost all of them.
I am not cut out for waiting.
So, the culture will have to wait till later...
I will let you take the Glauj.
You will not slow us down at all, will you?
Oh, I have got something good to ride.
Let us go save our comrades!
Hey, a kick to the side means move forward, right?
Does not it mean turn right?
If we do not get moving, the boss is going to...
I told you it meant advance, did not I?
It would be easier if he just told us though.
I guess he wants to do like how he saw in that Western film.
The units in lonesco City have just moved out.
103rd Destroid Platoon, what is your status?
We have come to help you!
Kamujin's forces and the Destroid Monsters of the 103rd have commenced hostilities.
The mouse has fallen into the hole.
There are only three Regulds around your target, the hall.
Minmay, I will get you out safely, no matter what.
Why did you choose such a dangerous plan to rescue us?
There must have been other options!
We took what we believed was the best course of action.
We gave top priority to the lives of the hostages.
I am sick of hearing about your priorities!
Hikaru and the others worked hard to save us, Kaifun.
It is been six months, has not it?
You are always in my heart.
Minmay, you always shine so bright.
We are out of ammunition too!
I will have Captain Ichijo help out.
If he has time to hang all over her, he is got time for this.
but Kamujin's men are on the run and I would like you to help hunt them down.
We have rescued the hostages, is not that enough?
Then ask someone else to do it!
And here I thought you were a squadron commander.
You want me to go, I will go!
It is been so long since we have seen each other.
I will not follow it anymore
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running to the end
But we still cannot see the goal
Yes, I know I can return...
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
Misa agonizes over her inability to be up-front about her feelings.
Claudia, worrying about Misa, tells her about her own experiences,
experiences that involve a young Claudia and Focker.
I will not follow it anymore
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running to the end
But we still cannot see the goal
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
